appDesc.description: Description of the application displayed in the online store.
appDesc.message: LockPW is a password protection for Browser.

appName.description: The name of the application displayed in the online store.

contextMenuLock.description: The name of the button in the context menu

helpPageStep1Description1.message: When you start the browser before opening the pages will ask for your password.

helpPageStep1Description2.message: You can also set different settings for yourself.

helpPageStep2Description1.message:
LockPW protects your browser automatically at startup.

To block the browser at any time, you can click LockPW in the context menu (right-click menu).

helpPageStep2Title.message: How can I block the browser

historyEAFocus.message: Lost focus from password entry window

loginPageButtonOk.description: Button on the password entry page

optionsPageCheckboxAttemptsLabel.message: Actions in case of exceeding login attempts:

optionsPageCheckboxAutoLockLabel.message: The browser will be locked after the specified period of inactivity

optionsPageCheckboxFullScreen.message: Opening the password entry window in full screen

optionsPageCheckboxFullScreenLabel.message: When you open the browser, the password entry window will completely overlap the browser.

optionsPageCheckboxMinimizeTitle.message: When you open all the windows are rolled up until the password is entered

optionsPageCheckboxQuickLabel.message: Fast lock the browser by pressing  "Ctrl+Shift+L"

optionsPageCheckboxSecurityModeOff.message: Now you can open other applications while chrome is locked. Note the disadvantages.

optionsPageCheckboxSecurityModeOn.message: This mode protects the LockPW process against terminating by some kind of task manager. Chrome will always be closed when you try to start another program while your browser is locked.

optionsPageInputAttemptsLimitPlaceholder.description: Tooltip in the box on the settings page

optionsPageInputAutoLockCheckbox.description: Tooltip in the box on the settings page

optionsPageInputPasswordConfirmPlacehold.description: Tooltip in the box on the settings page

optionsPageInputPasswordHelpPlaceholder.description: Tooltip in the box on the settings page

optionsPageInputPasswordPlaceholder.description: Tooltip in the box on the settings page

optionsPageInputPasswordStatusOff.message: The password protection is turned off!

optionsPageInputPasswordStatusOn.message: The password protection is turned on!
